metadata.title: CVE-2024-38807 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that use spring-boot-loader or spring-boot-loader-classic andcontain custom code that performs signature verification of nested jarfiles may be vulnerable to signature forgery where content that appears tohave been signed by one signer has, in fact, been signed by another.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
